tldr: Affected versions of this package fail to properly validate CSS from external files, creating a potential security risk. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability by crafting malicious files, which could lead to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attacks, potentially compromising user data or application integrity.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a vulnerable version of the package.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `shuchkin/simplexlsx` library to the patch version.
